001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.nio.charset.Charset;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.Comparator;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.function.Function;
009
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
013import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
014import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
015
016/**
017 * Advises, intercepts or filters a template before being rendered.
018 * <p>
019 * This extension point is largely to support dynamic updates of templates where a
020 * template is being edited while the JVM is fully loaded and we need to intercept the
021 * call to provide rendering of the updated template.
022 * <p>
023 * The extension will only be executed if {@link JStachio} render (and execute) methods
024 * are used and not the generated classes render methods.
025 * <p>
026 * When JStachio renders a model through the runtime it:
027 * <ol>
028 * <li>Loads the template. In some cases it may use reflection and thus
029 * {@link TemplateInfo} may not be a generated {@link Template}.</li>
030 * <li>Loads the composite filter which is all the filters combined in order (see
031 * {@link #order()}).</li>
032 * <li>Calls {@link #filter(TemplateInfo)} on the loaded template which returns a
033 * {@link FilterChain}.</li>
034 * <li>Then tells the chain to {@link FilterChain#process(Object, Appendable) process} the
035 * rendering.</li>
036 * </ol>
037 *
038 * @apiNote <strong class="warn"> &#x26A0; WARNING! While this extension point is public
039 * API it is recommended you do not use it.</strong> It is less stable than the rest of
040 * the API and is subject to change in the future. Implementations should be threadsafe!
041 * @author agentgt
042 *
043 */
044public non-sealed interface JStachioFilter extends JStachioExtension {
045
046        /**
047         * A fully composed chain that renders a model by applying filtering.
048         *
049         * @apiNote The filter chain should be stateless and threadsafe as there is no
050         * guarantee that a filter chain will be recreated for the same {@link TemplateInfo}.
051         * @author agentgt
052         *
053         */
054        public interface FilterChain {
055
056                /**
057                 * Renders the passed in model.
058                 * @param model a model assumed never to be <code>null</code>.
059                 * @param appendable the appendable to write to.
060                 * @throws IOException if there is an error writing to the appendable
061                 */
062                public void process(Object model, Appendable appendable) throws IOException;
063
064                /**
065                 * A marker method that the filter is broken and should not be used. This mainly
066                 * for the filter pipeline to determine if filter should be called.
067                 * @param model the model that would be rendered
068                 * @return by default false
069                 */
070                default boolean isBroken(Object model) {
071                        return false;
072                }
073
074                /**
075                 * Converts the filter chain into a template if it is not already one.
076                 * @param templateInfo template info to use if the filter chain is not a template.
077                 * @return chain as a template
078                 */
079                default Template<?> toTemplate(TemplateInfo templateInfo) {
080                        if (this instanceof Template<?> template) {
081                                return template;
082                        }
083                        return new Template<Object>() {
084
085                                @Override
086                                public String templateName() {
087                                        return templateInfo.templateName();
088                                }
089
090                                @Override
091                                public String templatePath() {
092                                        return templateInfo.templatePath();
093                                }
094
095                                @Override
096                                public Class<?> templateContentType() {
097                                        return templateInfo.templateContentType();
098                                }
099
100                                @Override
101                                public Charset templateCharset() {
102                                        return templateInfo.templateCharset();
103                                }
104
105                                @Override
106                                public String templateMediaType() {
107                                        return templateInfo.templateMediaType();
108                                }
109
110                                @Override
111                                public Function<String, String> templateEscaper() {
112                                        return templateInfo.templateEscaper();
113                                }
114
115                                @Override
116                                public Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter() {
117                                        return templateInfo.templateFormatter();
118                                }
119
120                                @Override
121                                public boolean supportsType(Class<?> type) {
122                                        return templateInfo.supportsType(type);
123                                }
124
125                                @Override
126                                public void execute(Object model, Appendable a) throws IOException {
127                                        process(model, a);
128                                }
129
130                                @Override
131                                public Class<?> modelClass() {
132                                        return templateInfo.modelClass();
133                                }
134
135                        };
136                }
137
138        }
139
140        /**
141         * Advises or filters a previously created filter.
142         * @param template info about the template
143         * @param previous the function returned early in the chain.
144         * @return an advised render function or often the previous render function if no
145         * advise is needed.
146         */
147        FilterChain filter( //
148                        TemplateInfo template, //
149                        FilterChain previous);
150
151        /**
152         * Applies filter with previous filter broken unless the parameter template is a
153         * {@link FilterChain} or is a{@link Template} which generated renderers usually are.
154         * @param template info about the template
155         * @return an advised render function or often the previous render function if no
156         * advise is needed.
157         */
158        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
159        default FilterChain filter( //
160                        TemplateInfo template) {
161                FilterChain previous = BrokenFilter.INSTANCE;
162                if (template instanceof FilterChain c) {
163                        previous = c;
164                }
165                else if (template instanceof @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") Template t) {
166                        /*
167                         * This is sort of abusing that filter chains happen to be a functional
168                         * interface
169                         */
170                        previous = (model, appendable) -> {
171                                t.execute(model, appendable);
172                        };
173                }
174                return filter(template, previous);
175        }
176
177        /**
178         * Hint on order of filter chain. The found {@link JStachioFilter}s are sorted
179         * naturally (lower number comes first) based on the returned number. Thus the filter
180         * that has the greatest say is the filter with the highest number.
181         * @return default returns zero
182         */
183        default int order() {
184                return 0;
185        }
186
187        /**
188         * Creates a composite filter of a many filters.
189         * @param filters not null.
190         * @return a composite filter ordered by {@link JStachioFilter#order()}
191         */
192        public static JStachioFilter compose(Iterable<JStachioFilter> filters) {
193                List<JStachioFilter> fs = new ArrayList<>();
194                for (var f : filters) {
195                        fs.add(f);
196                }
197                fs.sort(Comparator.comparingInt(JStachioFilter::order));
198                return new CompositeFilterChain(List.copyOf(fs));
199        }
200
201}
202
203/**
204 * Thrown if process is called on a broken filter. Currently this is a private API.
205 *
206 * @author agentgt
207 */
208class BrokenFilterException extends IOException {
209
210        private static final long serialVersionUID = -1206760388422768739L;
211
212        /**
213         * Invoked if filter is brken
214         * @param s message
215         */
216        public BrokenFilterException(String s) {
217                super(s);
218        }
219
220}
221
222enum BrokenFilter implements io.jstach.jstachio.spi.JStachioFilter.FilterChain {
223
224        INSTANCE;
225
226        @Override
227        public void process(Object model, Appendable appendable) throws IOException {
228                throw new BrokenFilterException("Unable to process model: " + model.getClass().getName()
229                                + " probably because a template could not be found.");
230        }
231
232        @Override
233        public boolean isBroken(Object model) {
234                return true;
235        }
236
237}
238
239class CompositeFilterChain implements JStachioFilter {
240
241        private final List<JStachioFilter> filters;
242
243        public CompositeFilterChain(List<JStachioFilter> filters) {
244                super();
245                this.filters = filters;
246        }
247
248        @Override
249        public FilterChain filter(TemplateInfo template, FilterChain previous) {
250                var current = previous;
251                for (var f : filters) {
252                        current = f.filter(template, current);
253                }
254                return current;
255        }
256
257}
